text:
Stars dressed to impress at the 74th Annual Venice Film Festival!

Hollywood's biggest names made the red carpet rounds at the annual event in Venice, Italy, and of course the fashion didn't disappoint.

Amal Clooney made her first red carpet appearance after giving birth to her twins back in June, wearing a dreamy lavender gown from Atelier Versace. She paired the look with Aquazzura shoes.

15 PHOTOS Venice Film Festival 2017: Most iconic red carpet looks See Gallery Venice Film Festival 2017: Most iconic red carpet looks Rebecca Hall dazzled in a PRADA gown with a thigh-high slit. (Getty) Amanda Seyfried was a total stunner in a floral Alexander McQueen frock. (Getty) Luciana Damon stole the show, again, from husband Matt in a silk emerald green Marchesa gown. (Getty) What a beauty! Michelle Pfeiffer wowed in a black-and-gold geometric sequined gown from Michael Kors. (Getty) What a showstopper! Jane Fonda dazzled in a dusty blue tulle Marchesa gown with floral embroidery. (Getty) Gorgeous! Jennifer Lawrence rocked a Giambattista Valli Resort gown with a striking black lace overlay.



(Getty) Julianne Moore turned heads in a black silk-organza PRADA dress accented with feathers and floral-motif detailing. (Getty) Amal Clooney made her post-pregnancy red carpet debut in a dramatic lavender gown from Atelier Versace. She paired the look with Aquazzura shoes. (Getty) Kirsten Dunst turned heads in a polka dot-patterned Rodarte gown. (Getty) Julianne Moore sparkled in Valentino. (Getty) Karolina Kurkova looked like a total princess in a Philosophy di Lorenzo Serafini creation. (Getty) Wowza! Octavia Spencer absolutely glowed in this Tadashi Shoji number. (Getty) Kristen Wiig was all smiles in a beaded Zuhair Murad gown. (Getty) What a picture-perfect couple! Matt Damon wore Versace, while wife Luciana Damon wore Atelier Versace. (Getty) Michelle Pfeiffer stunned in a Dolce & Gabbana floral midi-dress. (Getty) Up Next See Gallery Discover More Like This HIDE CAPTION SHOW CAPTION of SEE ALL BACK TO SLIDE

Jane Fonda was a total showstopper in a dusty blue tulle Marchesa gown with floral embroidery, while Amanda Seyfried stunned in a floral Alexander McQueen frock.

Matt Damon also made several red carpet appearances with his gorgeous wife Luciana alongside him. Of course, Luciana stole the spotlight from her husband of 12 years not once, but twice! She donned a Atelier Versace gown in a bright red hue for her first red carpet. Days later, she dazzled in a emerald green Marchesa gown.

The annual film festival is going on through September 9, so there are definitely more red carpet looks to come! Check out the slideshow for the best Venice Film Festival ensembles so far.

RELATED: The best of beauty at the Venice Film Festival:
